abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin will not be attending 70th anniversary of liberation of Auschwitz concentration camps in Poland, citing fact that he was not invited; ceremony organizers say no invitations were issued to any heads of state.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president’s spokesman said that he was not invited, but organizers of the 70th anniversary ceremony say there were no specific invitations.
snippet: The Russian president’s spokesman said that he was not invited, but organizers of the 70th anniversary ceremony say there were no specific invitations.

headline.main: Putin Won’t Attend Commemoration of Auschwitz Liberation
headline.print_headline: Russia: Putin Will Not Attend Auschwitz Ceremony in Poland
